explanation.text:
Explanation
By eating from the tree of knowledge, good and evil, Eve's innocence, along with all of mankind's was lost. She was introduced to the many feelings and emotions associated with the knowledge of good and evil. God knowing the nature of man, instructed them not to eat from the tree.

explanation.text:
Explanation
The world exists today because of Noah and his family's obedience to the instruction of God. 
God multiplied the world from the remnants that were saved from that ark. This means God used Noah and his family to rebuild the world after every other thing in it was destroyed by the flood.

keep what You promised
